location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Muskat to an undisclosed recipient

mods.abstract: Letter making arrangements for four horses to be shipped to Calcutta on the British India Steam Navigation Company vessel Penang.The letter also provides details of each horse and informs the recipient of the letter that a member of Pelly's residency staff will accompany the horses.
